derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin ridiculosus, from ridiculus 'laughable' (see ridicule)

entry.def: If you say that something or someone is ridiculous, you mean that they are very foolish.

example.ex: It is ridiculous to suggest we are having a romance...
example.tran: 暗示我们正在谈恋爱的说法真是太荒谬了。

example.ex: It was an absolutely ridiculous decision.
example.tran: 这是一个绝对荒谬的决定。

sentences.sentence: "how silly an ardent and unsuccessful wooer can be especially if he is getting on in years"- Dashiell Hammett

means.word_mean: 2. completely devoid of wisdom or good sense;

sentences.sentence: "the absurd excuse that the dog ate his homework"
"ask a nonsensical question and get a nonsensical answer"
"a contribution so small as to be laughable"
"it is ludicrous to call a cottage a mansion"
"a preposterous attempt to turn back the pages of history"
"her conceited assumption of universal interest in her rather dull children was ridiculous"

means.word_mean: 3. broadly or extravagantly humorous; resembling farce;

sentences.sentence: "the wild farcical exuberance of a clown"

auth_sentence.content: That would be ridiculous, so why mention it.
auth_sentence.res_content: That would be ridiculous, so why mention it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That would be ridiculous, so why mention it.

auth_sentence.content: To exclude any discussion of nuclear energy is ridiculous.
auth_sentence.res_content: To exclude any discussion of nuclear energy is ridiculous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To exclude any discussion of nuclear energy is ridiculous.

auth_sentence.content: Stuffed bell peppers are so big they're ridiculous!
auth_sentence.res_content: Stuffed bell peppers are so big they're ridiculous!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stuffed bell peppers are so big they're ridiculous!

Sentence.sentence: And they end up producing something utterly ridiculous.
Nobody will read papers on apparently ridiculous theories.

means.word_mean: 可笑的, 荒谬的,愚蠢的,荒唐的

sentences.en: It's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard in my life.
sentences.cn: 这是我有生以来听到的最为荒唐可笑的事。

sentences.en: It is ridiculous to dispute about such things.
sentences.cn: 争论这样的事情是可笑的。

sentences.en: It's ridiculous that we should have to queue, when we have already got our tickets.
sentences.cn: 我们已经拿到了票, 居然还要排队, 未免可笑。

jushi.english: It's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard in my life.
jushi.chinese: 这是我有生以来听到的最为荒唐可笑的事。

jushi.english: You look ridiculous in such a dress.
jushi.chinese: 你穿这样的衣服看上去很可笑。

jushi.english: It is ridiculous to dispute about such things.
jushi.chinese: 争论这样的事情是可笑的。
